definition: (of a woman) to adorn oneself/makeup/adornment/trousseau/stage makeup and costume

sentences.english: Would you recommend others to use Shiseido product?
sentences.chinese: 您會推薦朋友使用資生堂的彩妝品嗎？

sentences.english: You can go to Alamo Square to see the Painted Ladies.
sentences.chinese: 你可以去阿拉莫廣場看看彩妝女郎建築。

sentences.english: What is the average amount on purchasing the make-up products in Shiseido each month?
sentences.chinese: 平均一個月花多少錢在購買資生堂彩妝品上？

sentences.english: When you buy your first luxury makeup product.
sentences.chinese: 給自己買第一個高端彩妝產品。

sentences.english: Completely cleans any makeup and dirt, makes our skins as soft as silk.
sentences.chinese: 徹底清除彩妝及污垢，使肌膚幼滑如絲。

sentences.english: Make eye for a bottom, the makeup can more easily maintain more durable.
sentences.chinese: 爲眼部彩妝打底層，能使上妝更容易，保持更持久。

sentences.english: Why choosing our wedding make-up stylists?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼選擇我們的婚禮彩妝造型師？

sentences.english: Product such as but in ellicott obtained the degree for makeup and achievement happy.
sentences.chinese: 品如卻在爲艾莉獲得彩妝的學位和成就快樂。

sentences.english: Women might want to buy some new spring makeup or a fragrance.
sentences.chinese: 女孩子們是時候去選購春季的流行彩妝和新款香氛了。

sentences.english: Often seen at the department store makeup artist professional men.
sentences.chinese: 常常在百貨公司看到有專業的男性彩妝師。

sentences.english: Don't let your makeup fade or crease.
You need to take off your make-up with lotion and eye make-up remover.
sentences.chinese: 你需要用卸妝藥水和眼部清洗油去除你的彩妝。

sentences.english: Her cheekbones and eyelids are defined with bold, colorful sweeps of makeup.
sentences.chinese: 她的顴骨和眼瞼都化了彩妝。

sentences.english: Makeup should be used in thin texture effect with oil control products.
sentences.chinese: 彩妝應選用質地較薄具控油效果的產品。

sentences.english: Be it rich, be it plain, gladly accept the true colors of life with delight.
sentences.chinese: 容或妖豔，容或清麗，欣然接受生命真情的彩妝。

sentences.english: How often do you buy the make-up products in Shiseido?
sentences.chinese: 平均多久一次會在資生堂購買彩妝品？

definition: sales counter dedicated to a certain kind of product (e.g. alcohol)
outfit or suit (of clothes)/set of coordinated items/kit
(of a woman) to adorn oneself/makeup/adornment/trousseau/stage makeup and costume
to remove makeup/(old) to take off formal dress and ornaments
